5. Conclusion


As mentioned above (1.1), Marcus’ Meditations touch on many more
topics than the ones addressed here, but we get further in
understanding Marcus if we focus on a topic and see how his remarks on
that topic are related to his overall project of reminding himself how
a Stoic should live. It would be worth working this out for others of
his frequent remarks, such as that we are tiny and temporary fragments
in the cosmos, that death takes us all in the end, that we ought to
live purposively rather than like mechanical toys.
